revised_title: Erratum: Address of the President Sir Henry Dale, C.B.E., at the Anniversary Meeting, 1 December 1941
tldr: This article is an erratum for the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London, Series B, volume 130. It corrects a mistake in figure 4, where the percentages were entered incorrectly. The article also mentions the passing of Miles Walker, a pioneer in large-scale electrical engineering, and his contributions to the field.
